samples.context: Tissues are collections of cells that perform specific functions in an organism. They are made up of similar cells that work together to carry out particular tasks necessary for the body's operation. The four main types of tissues in animals are epithelial, connective, muscle, and nervous tissue, each serving distinct functions in maintaining health and supporting life.
